text: "Born to Run" is a rock music song by Bruce Springsteen. The song is on Springsteen's 1975 album, Born to Run. The song was recorded on August 1974. It became one of the biggest hits of his career. Rolling Stone ranked the song 21st on their list of "The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time". == Other websites == * Lyrics Category:1975 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Born to Run (Bruce Springsteen song)
